title: 306.57 APPLICATION.
text: Section 306.56 does not apply to a cemetery association or other governing board in a city of the first class, nor to such an association or board that has included the cost of perpetual maintenance of graves in the price of its cemetery lots. The section also does not apply when payment for the perpetual care of the lot or grave has been made to the cemetery association, nor if the deceased person has provided for care either while living or by last will and testament that has been admitted to probate.
